description: This is a multi cuisine restaurant, with Indian, tandoor, continental & coastal style.They do emphasis lot on quality and cleanliness which can be seen through their open & live kitchen. weekends evening are really beautiful with candle light setup & live fusion musics.and some times with live food counters on special request for groups. its really more & more....You should visit to experience it......
address: Oyster Bay, Kannada Parishath Rd, Mahadeswara Badavane, Vijayanagar 1st Stage.
